General.Name: HaiXin Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: HaiXin Foods Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of quick-frozen fish and meat products, rice and noodle products, room temperature snack food products, and quick-frozen dishes. The company's products mainly include hot pot balls, such as fish balls, meatballs, lucky bags, fish tofu, etc.; quick-frozen rice noodles, including egg yolk siu mai, quicksand buns, square buns, brown sugar steamed buns, etc.; quick-frozen dishes consisting grilled cheese rolls, crispy tripe, bacon, pangasius fillets, etc.; and room temperature leisure products, including crab fillet, fish tofu, instant oden, etc. It also offers dumpling and swallow products; various roll products, including fish meat roll and dragon and phoenix roll; and fried products, such as abalone cake, golden fish plate, dried scallop cake, crab paste, and fish roe Yuhuang. In addition, the company provides normal temperature leisure products, such as shredded crab fillet and fish tofu; meatball products that consisting of tribute balls and beef balls, and sausage products, such as crab king intestines, and sweet-scented osmanthus sausages. Further, it offers aquatic products; process and sells convenience foods; and imports and exports goods and technology, as well as provides aquatic frozen food storage and packaged food sale services. Additionally, the company engages in the food management business; research and development, production, and sale of marine biological products; refined research and development, processing, and sale of marine mineral resources, as well as marine biological resources; and wholesale and retail of pre-packaged and bulk food. It sells its products under the Haixin, Yuji, and Baiyaoxuan brands through self-operated stores on third-party platforms, as well as online direct sales. The company was formerly known as Fujian Tengxin Foods Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HaiXin Foods Co.,Ltd in July 2013. HaiXin Foods Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.
